body.name: Angetube Streaming 1080P HD Webcam Built in Adjustable Ring Light and Mic. Advanced autofocus AF Web Camera for Google Meet Xbox Gamer Facebook YouTube Streamer
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 22 mins
features: Adjustable Ring Fill Light: 967 webcam with 3 brightness levels,delivering different lighting requirements for your video chatting or streaming. Reduce particles and bring details in the dark environment.

Professional Webcam For Streaming: Plug and play on Xbox one.Widely compatible with live streaming software such as OBS Xsplit and Mixer.Support background replacement powered by Chromacam.Customized your background in games.

Dual Noise Canceling Microphones With Amplifer Chip: Superior microphones helps to improve speech quality for crystal and clear audio. The background noise is filtered out so that you can be clearly heard. Pickup sound up to 3 meters.
Fast And Accurate Autofocus: Thanks to autofocus function, you don’t have to be conscious of keeping steady in front of the camera all the time.
High Quality, Low Bandwidth: Thanks to the H.264 compression encoding, It is clearer and smoother for video recording, video conference and streaming live broadcast.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Streaming Web Camera With an Inbuilt Ring Light Designed and tested by top streamers, the Angetube 967 is a desktop streaming camera with a powerful, multi-step ring light that you can dim or brighten on command, and the ability to stream at 1080p 30 fps for full gaming fidelity. It’s the perfect webcamera for professional streaming.

Previous page Fast and Accurate Autofocus Enhanced autofocus helps to capture videos thatare as accurate and true-to-life as possible Webcam for Gamers Smooth Streams, No Lag Delivers at real-time with uncompressed 1080p 30FPS. Clear Stereo Audio Make sure everyone hears the real you. Built-in dual stereo mics, capture natural stereo audio. Next page 1 Auto-Focus 2 Smooth Streams 3 Dual Stereo Mics 4 H.264

Make a Great Impression See the difference Full HD 1080p makes compared to 720p—bringing sharpness to every meeting. Automatic low light correction Stream clear video, even in dim light. Video automatically adjusts to accommodate shadowy or harsh lighting conditions. Compatible with popular platforms Compatible with Broadcast and Video chatting software such as:OBS, mixer, YouTube, Facebook,Xsplit;Skype,ZOOM,Facetime,Hangouts,Amazon Chime. Flexible Clip Use the flexible clip to place the webcam on top of monitors, TVs, or on other surface with ease. You can attach the webcam to a tripod by the thread mount under the clip. (tripod not included)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flip it! this great little camera allows user to rotate image 90 or 180 degrees. Awesome resolution!
reviews.reviewText: All web meeting cameras allow user to mirror the image on the screen, and since so many are intended to be clipped to the top of you monitor, that is usually sufficient for most users.However, I need to mount my camera from the bottom of a shelf over my monitor. Upside down. And was having difficult time, reading the descriptions, determining which one to purchase.While the description of this Angetube 967Pro camera does not mention rotating the image, I was impressed by the reviews, the resolution, the zoom feature allowing Field of View changes, and the integrated ring light.All of which perform extremely well.Bonus is the fast auto focus, and the easy to use resident control panel for contrast and other video qualities.Have not evaluated the microphone as I have a dedicated one for my system.Very satisfied with this product, would buy again and highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice quality imaging
reviews.reviewText: Really happy with the picture quality. Adjusts well to different light levels in the room. Color rendition is good. The mount is solid and stays in position. I use a headset for sound so I can't comment on sound/mic quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it!!!!
reviews.reviewText: The 1080p Webcam with Ring Light is an excellent addition to any remote worker or online content creator's setup. This webcam is easy to install and use, with no additional software required. The plug-and-play feature makes it very convenient to use right out of the box.The built-in ring light is a great feature that sets this webcam apart from others in its price range. The ring light provides ample illumination, which means your video will be clear and well-lit even in low light conditions. The adjustable brightness levels are also a great touch, allowing you to customize the lighting to your preference.The video quality is excellent, with full HD 1080p resolution and a 90-degree viewing angle. The autofocus feature ensures that you're always in focus and that the video is crystal clear. The sound quality is also fantastic, with a built-in microphone that delivers clear and crisp audio.The design of this webcam is sleek and modern, and the adjustable clip makes it easy to attach to your laptop or desktop monitor. The cable is also a good length, which gives you plenty of flexibility in terms of placement.Overall, the 1080p Webcam with Ring Light is an excellent choice for anyone looking for a high-quality webcam with excellent video and audio quality. The built-in ring light is a standout feature, and the ease of use and installation makes it an ideal option for those who want to upgrade their video conferencing or content creation setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2021
reviews.reviewText: ORIGINAL REVIEW: WOW - this webcam exceeded my expectations. It looks and feels high quality. It's solid and doesn't feel like it'll break if you look at it wrong. I love how it perches securely on my laptop lid (no suction cup or clamp needed). The cord even comes with an attached velcro cord wrap.I wasn't sure if my work laptop would accept the hardware, but it worked immediately once I plugged it into the USB port. No lag, no problems.I thought the quality of my laptop's webcam was good, but holy cow was I wrong. This webcam is so much better. I also thought my room was just dark and/or shadowy and that a ring light would fix it. However, I think that I just needed a better webcam, because the lighting is tremendously better even without the webcam's ring light on (see photo - left is my laptop's webcam, right is this webcam wo the light on). Serious difference in quality and lighting.I highly recommend this webcam.UPDATE after 3 months of use: Still works great. Still love it. My husband bought one for his office and they're loving it too. I had the chance to try the Logitech C920S Pro HD Webcam and was shocked at how poor it performed compared to the Angetube. It struggled to focus on my face, the picture was much darker, and it gave everything a weird tint. If it was the first webcam I tried, I would have been really disappointed and probably gone back to my laptop camera.UPDATE after 1 year and 10 months of use: Unfortunately, this little camera is no longer so great. The hinge on the stand/clip bit is so loose, that it falls open 3" before it catches itself. This makes positioning it on my laptop screen really hard. It falls off very easily now or gradually opens wider and wider, until the camera is pointed at a weird angle. It's really easy to trigger the ring light when I'm trying to fix its position (and I still never use the light, so it's a pointless feature for me). The video feed has also started failing occasionally.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A quality product
reviews.reviewText: This camera is used for all of our remote meetings and works perfectly. Ordering and delivery was fast, simple and straightforward !
Fue un regalo para mi hijo y de momento está encantado
Petite webcam de qualité, avec une une bonne résolution
Die Webcam erfüllt die Erwartungen, einstecken und los mit recht guter Bildqualität und dimmbarem Ringlicht.

reviews.reviewTitle: great webcam for an amazing price
reviews.reviewText: this cam does everything i need it to do except zoom. looks great on my twitch streams. easy to set up. the light works great but i dont use it because it hurts my eyes when its sitting right above my screen. for a video call it would be perfect but for long gaming sessions it hurts. without the light on and just lights around the room lighting up my face it still works great!

reviews.reviewTitle: Consigliata per chi ha bisogno dello zoom, Ottima l'idea dello switch HD Full HD
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Buono il rapporto qualità prezzo.Questa webcam è l'evoluzione della Angetube 967.A differenza della sorella è di dimensioni più contenute e ha uno zoom che raggiunge il 5x e un microfono stereo.Qualità eccellente per la facia di prezzo (lo vedete nel video).Con un tasto sul retro si può switchare da HDR Fullhd 60 fps a HD 3o fps, funzione molto utile quando in video conferenza si soffre di poca banda in upload. Senza dover spegnere la webcam puoi abbassare la risoluzione e rimanere visibile.Rispetto alla 967 è più veloce nel mettere a fuoco e nell'adattarsi alla luce.Dichiarato che usa un sistema di codifica H265 quindi permettere di trasmettere in alta qualità usando meno banda rispetto ad altri sistemi di compressione meno recenti (da confrontare con alte telecamere per fare valutazioni su questo fronte)Lo zoom è impressionante, arriva a 5x senza perdere di qualità, la consiglio per chi ha monitor lontani o comunque non voglia avere ingombri vicino alla postazione di lavoro.Ha il supporto per qualsiasi cavalletto. Io uso un treppiede (octopus) ed è molto stabile una volta montata.La luce ad anello si può regolare di intensità è "dimmerabile"Non ho capito perchè abbiano introdotte un pulsante fisico per regolare la luce quando lo puoi fare premendo in qualsiasi punto della parte frontale.Non ha la regolazione della temperature della luce ad anello che rimane abbastanza fredda. Non lo vedo un problema perchè comunque la qualità dell'obbiettivo è buona e i colori sono sempre naturali.Da migliorare:Speravo di più dal microfono stereo, c'e' un leggero fruscio di fondo ma è comunque migliore di un microfono da laptop non top di gamma.Il coperchio fisico per chiudere l'obiettivo un po' "rigido" . la telecamera si muove quando lo chiudi , devi quindi tenerla ferma con le mani se è appoggiata al monitor
